oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Court House Day, Nashville, Tennessee, 1977 August
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Three young women (pictured left to right: Gena Collier, Lee Ann Lamb, and Tammy Beals) wearing stylish long dresses posing next to the fountain at the 1977 Courthouse Day hosted in Nashville, Tennessee. This civic event took place during the mayorship of Richard Fulton, the 64th Mayor of Nashville, Tennessee, who served in office from 1975-1987. Forms part of the Kolleen Hudgins, Director of Special Events, Mayor’s Office Collection. 1 b & w photograph.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hudgins, Kolleen; Fulton, Richard
